Key Match Events: Moustafa Mashal scored the opening goal for Qatar in the 4th minute
Almoez Ali doubled Qatar's lead in the 47th minute
Yousuf Abdurisag scored the third goal for Qatar in the 80th minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's 15-game unbeaten home run came to an end
Others: India's next opponents will be Afghanistan in their third group game on March 21, 2024
